name: Flower Garden Blast - Sweet Rose
description: Flower Garden Blast - Sweet Rose is all-new exciting match-3 game from a team of top hit game store. In the dreamy garden, flower fairies invited you and friends to plant & bloom the flowers. From the bud to blossom. Each level with challenging puzzle is started with just a dull bush, once you have solve the puzzle, the flowers will bloom from bud to blossom. It is an addictive mania matching game that everyone should not missed!
